tweet: Just finished the FREE @Cardano @IOHK_Charles Udemy introductory course on Marlowe programming language. It was very helpful in understanding the thought process for developing smart contracts on Cardano. Ready for the next course when it comes available.   https://t.co/6fsOpr93tQ

Excited about the "Cardano on the Rocks" session | Stage B | April 17, 1:15pm EST | "Demonstrat[ing] how a full Cardano node can run on low-cost open source hardware (a Rock Pi), using less than ten watts of power."   EMURGO is recording 👀 *Not on main stage* #IOHKSummit2019  https://t.co/XtZutPgsu3

We are pushing a small app-update 1.8.1 and 1.9 including Cardano $ADA is now in beta!  Mort gets you caught up on the latest with the dev team, and walks through how we work together as a decentralized team.  Read this week's Dev Diary:  https://t.co/0jqAGZy3hL

BriterBridges creates #InnovationMaps that is a visual series aimed at showcasing technology ecosystems across emerging markets. It's great to see IOHK leading the way in High Tech in Ethiopia!  https://t.co/2uIpttmbNE
